name: Guardian Pillar: Innumerable Sparks
description: Towering high within the Stadium of the Sacred Flame, these slender stone pillars are adorned with intricate serrated patterns. The most numerous and versatile type of pillar in the Stadium, they stand as symbols of all the people of Natlan.\nThe foundation of Natlan's endurance rests upon the shoulders of its diligent and endearing denizens. Like countless sparks uniting as one, they blaze together to form the mighty flame of Natlan that we see today.
